page.title: 10A Public House-Dorking NE
page.content: The Arkle Manor is more than a public house.It is really a{steak restaurant. It is on the{A25 road to Reigate}and passing tourists,including foreigners from{Gatwick Airport}come in for meals.The main trade is from regular customers who come from some distance because{they like the atmosphere. The staff we talked to were very friendly.There were jockey silks and pictures of famous horses and riders that made the place welcoming. About{300 meals}are served every week in the steak house and{400 meals in the bar.Times when they are exceptionally busy are;Christmas, Easter and New Year, and at summer weekends. We were told that the breweries were putting up the price of beer too often at the moment.{A pint of bitter costs {Â£0.90}in the bar.
